resources.string:
vShell provides a virtual machine with Alpine Linux installation running on emulated hardware. Booting the operating system can take up to 5 minutes, depending on how fast your device is. A some knowledge about shell scripting and administering Linux systems is required in order to use the application successfully.

Once you close this dialog, a Storage Access Permission would be requested if was not granted previously. This permission is used to allow accessing your files inside the virtual machine.

Long tap anywhere on screen to show a menu of actions, including the access to application user's guide.

Disclaimer: neither this application nor its author is affiliated with the Alpine Linux project. Operating system is provided as-is and vShell author is not responsible about bugs in the software packages.
